slides.title: Welcome to the Tutorial
slides.body:
This is an HTML-based tutorial system. Unlike images, this text is selectable, accessible, and responsive.

You can use standard HTML tags here:

  • Lists
  • Bold and Italic text
  • Code snippets like <div>

Click Next to see a quiz.

slides.question: Which HTML tag is used to create a hyperlink?
slides.feedback: The <a> tag (anchor) defines a hyperlink, which is used to link from one page to another.

slides.title: Code Examples
slides.body:
We can also display code blocks effectively.

function helloWorld() {
  console.log('Hello, Tutorial!');
}

This is useful for technical walkthroughs.

slides.question: What does CSS stand for?
slides.feedback: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets. It describes how HTML elements are to be displayed on screen.
